page.title: 09Shopping In Stithians
page.content: Stithians has three shops, a post office, a newsagents/ general store {(VG)} and the corner store. All the shops are run by married couples who seem to enjoy being shopkeepers. The {VG}and corner stores are handy for the villagers because it saves petrol or bus fares. The{Corner Stores}also called{Macs,}sells everything from bread to umbrellas. Bread was their best selling item, they sell a lot of sweets especially Mars Bars. They also accept telephone orders especially from pensioners and deliver them. Suprisingly this shop had a defence siren in case of an attack. The paper shop sold more papers than anything else and their most unusual item was a watering can. The{post office}sells more 17p stamps than they do sweets, toys and stationery.
